definition: to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces

sentences.english: And the equipment of kitchen guarding is the main part of interior decoration.
sentences.chinese: 而厨卫的装修是室内装修的主要部分。

sentences.english: It is music played for sprung ceiling of kitchen & bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 是厨卫顶空奏起的乐篇。

sentences.english: For you and your family create a hundred percent healthy kitchen and new space.
sentences.chinese: 为您和您的家人创造百分百的键康厨卫新空间。

sentences.english: Leakage problem in kitchen and toilet is the common problem.
sentences.chinese: 厨卫间渗漏是住宅工程常见的质量问题。

sentences.english: You will be satisfied with the kitchen equipment here.
sentences.chinese: 你一定会对这里的厨卫设备感到满意。

sentences.english: Linna is a high-end kitchen yet poetic works of art products.
sentences.chinese: 诗琳纳是高档厨卫尚品的艺术精品。

definition: cupboard/cupboard that can also be used as a table/sideboard
drain/underground drainpipe/floor gutter/25th of 2nd lunar month
to decorate/interior decoration/to fit up/to renovate
